type.description: type can be elem, page, meta

name.description: name of element. It is used by ev-ui-router, ev-app-route uses actual name from imported document instead of this property

path.description: Express style URL pattern to be handled by this route

import.description: component or file to be imported for this route for lazy loading

group.description: different html files should be able to load different routes based on this, TODO functionaility in router

targetElement.description: used by ev-ui-router, not used by ev-app-route

retainInstance.description: whether ev-app-route should retain the state when you switch the route

transitions.description: Specifies the event based route transitions when application is at this route
